resources.string: You don\'t have a payment due
Make a payment to bring your account up to date.
We\'ll open your browser so you can pay. You may need to log in again. We\'re adding this feature to our app soon.
Make a payment on our website
We\'ll take you to PayPal.com so you can pay. To make a payment in our app, link a bank.
We\'ll take you to PayPal.com so you can pay. To make a payment in our app, link a bank or card.
Choose what to pay every month.
Same-day payments made by 11:59 PM Pacific Time will post to your account with today\'s date. They cannot be changed or cancelled after 2:00 PM Pacific Time.
Same-day payments will reflect on your account with the same date.
By clicking Pay, I authorize this scheduled payment in accordance with the User Agreement.
You scheduled a payment of %s to PayPal Credit
We\'ll update your account as soon as this payment processes.
You have a payment pending, so we\'ve reduced the amount you need to pay.
When do you want to pay?
Amount can\'t exceed your current balance
PayPal balance won\'t cover this amount
Good news. You already paid your balance in full.
Tell us how you want to set up your automatic payments.
Tell us how you want to set up your Direct Debit payments.
You\'re done!\nYour auto pay is all set up.
You\'re done!\nDirect Debit is all set up.

Your payments will start on your due date.

Each month, we'll take the %1$s from %2$s.

We'll send you an email in advance with the exact amount we plan to take.

Your payments will start on your next statement.

Each month, we'll take %1$s from %2$s.

We'll send you an email in advance with the exact amount we plan to take.
By clicking Agree and Schedule, I authorize the automatic payments in accordance  with User Agreement.
By clicking Agree and Schedule Direct Debit, I authorize Direct Debit payments in accordance  with User Agreement.
You\'re one step away from making hassle-free payments.
You\'re one step away from setting up Direct Debit payments.
Set up auto pay on our website.
We\'ll take you to PayPal.com so you can set up auto pay. You may need to log in again.
Set up Direct Debit on our website.
We\'ll take you to PayPal.com so you can set up Direct Debit. You may need to log in again.
Payments will recur on your due date.
Payments will be processed on your due date each month
Payments will be processed on your due date each month
The exact payment amount may change each month based on your credit activity.
We’ll never withdraw more than your last statement balance or less than the minimum payment due.
You can only use a linked bank to make automatic payments.
Get all the advantages of %s with helpful features like setting your preferred payment method.
Manage your settings here to take full advantage of PayPal Credit
We’ll use %s when you shop online or send money for goods and services.
We’ll use %s when you shop online.

Setting a preferred way to pay online can help you check out even faster. Of course, you’ll always be able to choose a different way to pay at checkout.

We’ll use it when you:
 - Shop online
 - Send money to pay for goods and services

Sending money to friends and family
We’ll first show the options that can save you money on fees, like your PayPal balance or your bank.

More about using PayPal balance as preferred
If you have multiple currencies, transactions using balance may be subject to currency conversion fees.

For more information, please read our User Agreement.

Setting PayPal Credit as your preferred way to pay online helps you check out even faster.

When PayPal Credit is set as your preferred way to pay, we’ll use it automatically every time you check out. You can always choose a different way to pay any time at checkout.

PayPal Credit can’t currently be used for Send Money transactions.

For more information, please read our User Agreement.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
No more worries - pay on time
To edit auto pay, log in to our website and go to Manage Payments.
To edit Direct Debit, log in to our website and go to Manage Payments.
Edit auto pay on our website
Edit Direct Debit on our website
After you log in, go to Manage Payments to edit auto pay.
After you log in, go to Manage Payments to edit Direct Debit.
Auto pay is all set up!\n\nJust remember that your %s payment will not be automatic.
Direct Debit starts after your next due date.\n\nYou need to make a single payment to cover the amount due on %s.
Auto pay will start making monthly payments on %s.
Direct Debit will start with your next statement.
You still need to make this month\'s payment.
We’re taking you to\nyour plan details
We can\'t display your plan(s) right now. Please check back later.
We can\'t handle this request right now. Try again in a few minutes.
Something seems to have gone wrong. Please try again.
We\’re sorry, something seems to have gone wrong. Please try again.
Are you sure you want to exit %s?
Are you sure you want to exit the PayPal Credit application?
The info you entered won’t be saved if you exit.
Provide your current income to make sure you don’t miss out on possible credit line increases.
You don’t need to include alimony, child support, or separate maintenance income unless relied upon for credit. You may include the amount that you have available each year to spend from your assets.
Review your current income to make sure it is accurate.
By clicking Save Income, you are confirming that your annual income after taxes shown here is accurate.
Why are we asking for your income?

We review your credit limit and income periodically to see if you\'re eligible for a credit line increase.

If you\'re checking out with PayPal Credit and don\'t have enough available credit to cover your purchase, we may evaluate your account for a Credit Line increase. This process happens seamlessly during checkout and doesn\'t slow down the checkout process.
You updated your annual income after taxes.
Enter your annual income after taxes
Do you also want to update your %s profile?
You updated your profile for PayPal only.
